description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共嘉峪关市委书记，甘肃省人大常委会秘书长、副主任，第十届全国人大代表。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Secretary of the CPC Jiayuguan Municipal Committee, Secretary-General and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Gansu Provincial People's Congress, and a deputy to the 10th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 张开勋是中共中央党校校友。
description.en: Zhang Kaixun is an alumnus of the Central Party School of the Communist Party of China.
